credits.btw: All COMMENT_FOR_TRANSLATOR keys are comments that help you how to write translations. Follow these so you get approved faster.

plugins.description: Manage the plugins of an existing project

initModal.couldntFetchTemplates: Couldn't fetch templates! Please do CTRL+R (u online?)
initModal.installPackagesCheckbox: Install packages while you're at it
initModal.COMMENT_FOR_TRANSLATOR_2: the next string is used to change the text 'with' in the sentence 'with <package manager>'

footer.COMMENT_FOR_TRANSLATOR: Keep all the strings here as lowercase. It kinda gives a good vibe to the text :D
footer.COMMENT_FOR_TRANSLATOR_2: Keep these at their current state. They are brands after all, so you shouldn't change these unless they are called differently in other languages
